    Load and prepare data for model fitting

    fm_load_data.Rd

    Load and prepare data for model fitting

    fm_load_data(
  species = "Solea_solea",
  fleet = c("OTB_DEF_>=70_0", "OTB_CEP_>=70_0", "OTT_DEF_>=70_0"),
  survey_data_file = "survey_data.Rdata",
  vmslogbook_data_file = "vmslogbook_data.Rdata",
  study_domain_file = "study_domain.Rdata",
  year_start = 2018,
  year_end = 2018,
  month_start = 11,
  month_end = 11,
  time_step = "Month"
)

    Arguments

    species

    character Name of the species of interest, match the data folder name

    fleet

    character Vector of conditional operation to filter fleets, the first one will be taken as reference level in the model

    survey_data_file

    character Name of the Rdata file storing scientific observations

    vmslogbook_data_file

    character Name of the Rdata file storing vms x logbooks observations

    study_domain_file

    character Name of the Rdata file storing study domain informations

    year_start

    integer Lower bound year filter to select data

    year_end

    integer Upper bound year filter to select data

    month_start

    integer Lower bound month filter to select data

    month_end

    integer Upper bound month filter to select data

    time_step

    character Time intervals, must be Month or Quarter

    Value

    list A named list of all necessary outputs for model fitting (step 2)

    Examples

    # run part1
fm_data_inputs <- fm_load_data()
#> Running step 1 -loading data-
#> as(<dgCMatrix>, "dgTMatrix") is deprecated since Matrix 1.5-0; do as(., "TsparseMatrix") instead
#> Joining with `by = join_by(Year, Month)`
#> Joining with `by = join_by(Month, Year, Year_Month)`
#> Joining with `by = join_by(layer, cell)`
#> Joining with `by = join_by(layer, cell)`
#> Joining with `by = join_by(layer, cell)`
#> Step 1 -loading data-: 15.206 sec elapsed
